::Savanna::

"Gotcha.  This is going to be fun."
She smiled as only a lioness can.  She was in the mood for a good 
fight and could hardly wait for the fun to begin.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod continued to walk, and began talking to Savanna.
> "Savanna, we are here to shoot any Alliance member you see. Sooner 
or
> later, Prowl and Dinobot are going to come out of there with the
> hostages. Are mission is to hold off the Alliance troops that are 
going
> to be on there tail."
